plot.content: This plot is one physical counterpart that was ordered by the digital owner of 'Plottable Golden Train #2'. Plottable Golden Train includes many variations (bridges, cactus, clouds, eagles, colors,...) entirely generated with code at mint (generative art).

prev.content:
This plot is a prototype made before the release of Plottable Mandelglitch.

Plottable Mandelglitch is based on a shader I created in 2020, but entirely reimplemented in the paradigm of plots. It combines various mandelbrot fractal distortions, noise and domain warping. 21 different inks palette and 5 different paper are possible.

next.content:
Following my recent exploration of "weight map" based polylines placing (in Plottable Mandelglitch), I wanted to try to apply the same technique to a photo.

I used a photo of my kids, and plotted with white gel pen and black isograph on a grey paper.

The result is a bit different from my expectation as there were a bit too much white visible here, this is due to plotting the white over the black color.
